data: Anna V. Sharikova Anna V. Sharikova Visiting Assistant Professor Biology 055 518-442-4565 PhD University of South Florida Postdoctoral Research Fellow, University of Michigan (2009-2012) Postdoctoral Researcher, University of Pennsylvania (2012-2014) Visiting Assistant Professor, University at Albany (2014-present) Laser-induced fluorescence (LIF) of atomic and molecular systems, ultrafast laser spectroscopy, fluorescence spectroscopy and dosimetry for photodynamic therapy (PDT). Hyperspectral imaging and terahertz spectroscopy for biological applications. Current Research and Publication: See µ BioLab Patents: US7812946 B1 and US8467059 B2 with University of South Florida.
